data.title: Lux: Generative latent-variable modeling of astronomical data
data.name: Lux

evidence: "An implementation of the method Lux: A generative, multi-output, latent-variable model for astronomical data with noisy labels" (indicates a research method implementation, used directly for scientific modeling/analysis).

The README presents the project simply as an "implementation" of a specific astronomical data modeling method, implying users run this code as the end research tool rather than import it as a generic library.
No installation via package managers, containers, or binaries is mentioned; the minimal README suggests use directly from the source repository.
